messages.message: Product Roadmap Question: For AI Hub Commercial, can a process be started via API, while users login to complete Human Review and then have an API export to another system (or perhaps the original system is polling for the completed documents)?

a Run App API is already available on prod. it will be available for both Community and Commercial users

Lightweight Human Review through the UI will be available for all Commercial users in 23.37

There is an existing results API that is exposed on AI Hub prod. Similarly, there is a Job status API that users can use to poll for run status. We are making some usability improvements to both for 23.37 and adding API docs to the platform for all aforementioned APIs.

Thanks Andy. I believe you've confirmed that an API can be combined with Lightweight Human Review in 23.37. Correct? Also, can you point me towards information on what we can expect for the "Lightweight Human Review"?
ya you can always trigger runs and retrieve results through API. human review is an optional intermediary step through the UI to edit values

quick summary on lightweight human review is just editing field values (including nested fields like tables and JSON) and editing classifications

CC: @Bastiane on anything to share here
Any "lassoing"? Will providence be provided? Format validations (dates, currencies, etc.)?

no lassoing in this first version

provenance and auto-navigation to provenance will be supported as long as provenance extraction works as expected

confidence validations and displaying validation alert messages in human review are also targeted for 23.37
